about.details:
Incorporated in 2014, Mumbai based Milestone Furniture Limited is engaged in the manufacturing and marketing of Interior and Modular Furniture business.

The company has developed expertise in Space & workstation Management, designing and innovation in Furniture used in Education, Healthcare and Corporate organization. It also
developed the In-house technical & Design team to provide turnkey solutions and implementation of interior and workspace in Commercial, Residential and Institutions. It has developed an In-house team of professionals for design, drawing, and space management interiors suitable and specification of client needs.

Milestone has a high tech manufacturing equipment and Design facility to manufacture the various combination and size products in Sakinaka, Mumbai. The Company currently has 70 employees on its payroll.

faqs.question: What is the Milestone Furniture IPO?
faqs.answer:
Milestone Furniture IPO is a SME IPO of 3297000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹14.84 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹45 per share. The minimum order quantity is 3000.

The IPO opens on May 7, 2018, and closes on May 11, 2018.

Kfin Technologies Limited is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Milestone Furniture IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Milestone Furniture IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Milestone Furniture IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Milestone Furniture IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Milestone Furniture IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Milestone Furniture IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Milestone Furniture IPO opens on May 7, 2018 and closes on May 11, 2018.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Milestone Furniture IPO?
faqs.answer: Milestone Furniture IPO lot size is 3000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,35,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Milestone Furniture IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Milestone Furniture IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Milestone Furniture IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Milestone Furniture IPO will be done on Wednesday, May 16, 2018, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Friday, May 18, 2018. Check the Milestone Furniture IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Milestone Furniture IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Milestone Furniture IPO listing date is on Monday, May 21, 2018.
